root.name: Rugby Challenge
root.description: Rugby Challenge will be released in New Zealand on the 26th of August and internationally from September on-wards. Sidhe has developed rugby challenge with a focus on heavy customization of players and has used new design techniques helped by Wellington based special effects firm Weta Workshop who is most well known for working on the Lord of the Rings films and the up and coming Hobbit Films.Rugby Challenge is one of two new rugby union games being developed to coincide with the Rugby World Cup which is being played in New Zealand in 2011. They will be the first rugby union games to be developed on the current generations of consoles.
